info.name: TahyaMisr API Collection
info.description: Complete API collection for TahyaMisr platform including authentication, users, news, events, join requests, site settings, and more

request.description: Login with email and password. Token is automatically saved to environment.
Get currently logged in user information
Reset password using token from email
Get all users with pagination (Admin only)
Create new user with any role (Admin only). Roles: member, volunteer, publisher, admin
Update user information (Admin can update all fields including role)
Get single news article by ID (Public)

request.description: Submit a new join request. Available roles: member, volunteer, publisher
Get all join requests (Admin only). Filter by status: pending, approved, rejected
Get single join request by ID (Admin only)
Approve join request and create user account with requested role (Admin only)
Reject join request with optional reason (Admin only)
Update site settings (Admin only). Controls join requests availability and maintenance mode.
Quickly toggle join requests on/off (Admin only)
Get all media items (Public). Filter by type: image, video
Mark all notifications as read for current user
